thread.title: VIDEO: Tom Jones on love, life and Elvis
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Tom Jones on love, life and Elvis

title: VIDEO: Tom Jones on love, life and Elvis
text:
Tom Jones on love, life and antics with Elvis 19   11:10 BST 
He is 75 and has been in the business for more than half a century, but Sir Tom Jones is not showing any signs of slowing down. 
He is bringing out a new album, as well as an autobiography that shares the secrets of a lifetime in showbiz. 
It includes insights into his marriage, and a colourful stories about close encounters with Elvis. 
The BBC's Louise Minchin went to meet him.
